title: Verify: Upgrade Frontend Build Tool to Vite
description:
Run automated tests for task T-013.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Migrate frontend from CRA (react-scripts) to Vite 6. Update build scripts, configuration, and ensure app runs and builds successfully.
Criteria:
- CRA removed, Vite 6 configured
- Frontend builds and runs locally
- No major regressions
